dict.acceptation: 较晚地；以后，过后；后来；随后；
后来的；以后的；接近末期的；晚年的；

sent.orig: People left school later, left home later, married later, had children later.
sent.trans: 人们更晚离开校园，更晚离开家，更晚结婚，更晚生孩子。

sent.orig: Time: 15 hours later than U. S. Eastern Standsrd, 10 hours later than Greenwich Mean.
sent.trans: 时差：比美国东部时间晚15个小时，比格林尼治时间晚10个小时。

sent.orig: They would roll in later and later every night.
sent.trans: 他们一天比一天睡得晚。

sent.orig: Would you like your coffee with your dinner or later? Later, please.
sent.trans: 您点的咖啡随餐一起上，还是等会儿再上？ 请待会儿送来。

sent.orig: Later, some humanshaped giants called Titans were born; they later became the first gods and goddesses.
sent.trans: 之后，一些叫做提坦的人形巨人诞生了；他们随后成为了最初的天神和女神。
